channel.update.title: Channel Update
channel.update.description: A broadcaster updates their channel properties e.g., category, title, mature flag, broadcast, or language.

is_mature.description: A boolean identifying whether the channel is flagged as mature. Valid values aretrueandfalse.

channel.follow.title: Channel Follow
channel.follow.description: A specified channel receives a follow.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user now following the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user now following the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user now following the specified channel.

followed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the follow occurred.

channel.subscribe.title: Channel Subscribe
channel.subscribe.description: A notification when a specified channel receives a subscriber. This does not include resubscribes.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who subscribed to the specified channel.

tier.description: The tier of the subscription. Valid values are 1000, 2000, and 3000.

is_gift.description: Whether the subscription is a gift.

channel.subscription.end.title: Channel Subscription End
channel.subscription.end.description: A notification when a subscription to the specified channel ends.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user whose subscription ended.

user_login.description: The user login for the user whose subscription ended.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user whose subscription ended.

tier.description: The tier of the subscription that ended. Valid values are 1000, 2000, and 3000.

is_gift.description: Whether the subscription was a gift.

channel.subscription.gift.title: Channel Subscription Gift
channel.subscription.gift.description: A notification when a viewer gives a gift subscription to one or more users in the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user who sent the subscription gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

user_login.description: The user login of the user who sent the gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

user_name.description: The user display name of the user who sent the gift. Set to null if it was an anonymous subscription gift.

total.description: The number of subscriptions in the subscription gift.

tier.description: The tier of subscriptions in the subscription gift.

cumulative_total.description: The number of subscriptions gifted by this user in the channel. This value is null for anonymous gifts or if the gifter has opted out of sharing this information.

is_anonymous.description: Whether the subscription gift was anonymous.

channel.subscription.message.title: Channel Subscription Message
channel.subscription.message.description: A notification when a user sends a resubscription chat message in a specific channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the user who sent a resubscription chat message.

user_login.description: The user login of the user who sent a resubscription chat message.

user_name.description: The user display name of the user who a resubscription chat message.

tier.description: The tier of the users subscription.

message.description: An object that contains the resubscription message and emote information needed to recreate the message.

text.description: The text of the resubscription chat message.

emotes.description: An array that includes the emote ID and start and end positions for where the emote appears in the text.

begin.description: The index of where the Emote starts in the text.

end.description: The index of where the Emote ends in the text.

cumulative_months.description: The total number of months the user has been subscribed to the channel.

streak_months.description: The number of consecutive months the users current subscription has been active. This value is null if the user has opted out of sharing this information.

duration_months.description: The month duration of the subscription.

channel.cheer.title: Channel Cheer
channel.cheer.description: A user cheers on the specified channel.

is_anonymous.description: Whether the user cheered anonymously or not.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who cheered on the specified channel. This is null ifis_anonymousis true.

message.description: The message sent with the cheer.

channel.raid.title: Channel Raid
channel.raid.description: A broadcaster raids another broadcasters channel.

from_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster ID that created the raid.

from_broadcaster_user_login.description: The broadcaster login that created the raid.

from_broadcaster_user_name.description: The broadcaster display name that created the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_id.description: The broadcaster ID that received the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_login.description: The broadcaster login that received the raid.

to_broadcaster_user_name.description: The broadcaster display name that received the raid.

viewers.description: The number of viewers in the raid.

channel.ban.title: Channel Ban
channel.ban.description: A viewer is banned from the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who was banned on the specified channel.

moderator_user_id.description: The user ID of the issuer of the ban.

moderator_user_login.description: The user login of the issuer of the ban.

moderator_user_name.description: The user name of the issuer of the ban.

ends_at.description: Will be null if permanent ban. If it is a timeout, this field shows when the timeout will end.

is_permanent.description: Indicates whether the ban is permanent (true) or a timeout (false). If true, ends_at will be null.

channel.unban.title: Channel Unban
channel.unban.description: A viewer is unbanned from the specified channel.

user_id.description: The user id for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

user_login.description: The user login for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

user_name.description: The user display name for the user who was unbanned on the specified channel.

moderator_user_id.description: The user ID of the issuer of the unban.

moderator_user_login.description: The user login of the issuer of the unban.

moderator_user_name.description: The user name of the issuer of the unban.

channel.moderator.add.title: Channel Moderator Add
channel.moderator.add.description: Moderator privileges were added to a user on a specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the new moderator.

user_login.description: The user login of the new moderator.

user_name.description: The display name of the new moderator.

channel.moderator.remove.title: Channel Moderator Remove
channel.moderator.remove.description: Moderator privileges were removed from a user on a specified channel.

user_id.description: The user ID of the removed moderator.

user_login.description: The user login of the removed moderator.

user_name.description: The display name of the removed moderator.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward.add.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Add
channel.channel_points_custom_reward.add.description: A custom channel points reward has been created for the specified channel.

is_enabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled. If false, the reward wont show up to viewers.

is_paused.description: Is the reward currently paused. If true, viewers cant redeem.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

max_per_user_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per user per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

value.description: The max per user per stream limit.

background_color.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example:#FA1ED2.

image.description: Set of custom images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward. Can benullif no images have been uploaded.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

default_image.description: Set of default images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

global_cooldown.description: Whether a cooldown is enabled and what the cooldown is in seconds.

cooldown_expires_at.description: Timestamp of the cooldown expiration.nullif the reward isnt on cooldown.

redemptions_redeemed_current_stream.description: The number of redemptions redeemed during the current live stream. Counts against themax_per_streamlimit.nullif the broadcasters stream isnt live ormax_per_streamisnt enabled.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward.upd.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Update
channel.channel_points_custom_reward.upd.description: A custom channel points reward has been updated for the specified channel.

is_enabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled. If false, the reward wont show up to viewers.

is_paused.description: Is the reward currently paused. If true, viewers cant redeem.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

max_per_user_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per user per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

value.description: The max per user per stream limit.

background_color.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example:#FA1ED2.

image.description: Set of custom images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward. Can benullif no images have been uploaded.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

default_image.description: Set of default images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

global_cooldown.description: Whether a cooldown is enabled and what the cooldown is in seconds.

cooldown_expires_at.description: Timestamp of the cooldown expiration.nullif the reward isnt on cooldown.

redemptions_redeemed_current_stream.description: The number of redemptions redeemed during the current live stream. Counts against themax_per_streamlimit.nullif the broadcasters stream isnt live ormax_per_streamisnt enabled.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward.rem.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Remove
channel.channel_points_custom_reward.rem.description: A custom channel points reward has been removed from the specified channel.

is_enabled.description: Is the reward currently enabled. If false, the reward wont show up to viewers.

is_paused.description: Is the reward currently paused. If true, viewers cant redeem.

is_in_stock.description: Is the reward currently in stock. If false, viewers cant redeem.

is_user_input_required.description: Does the viewer need to enter information when redeeming the reward.

should_redemptions_skip_request_queue.description: Should redemptions be set tofulfilledstatus immediately when redeemed and skip the request queue instead of the normalunfulfilledstatus.

max_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

max_per_user_per_stream.description: Whether a maximum per user per stream is enabled and what the maximum is.

value.description: The max per user per stream limit.

background_color.description: Custom background color for the reward. Format: Hex with # prefix. Example:#FA1ED2.

image.description: Set of custom images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward. Can benullif no images have been uploaded.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

default_image.description: Set of default images of 1x, 2x and 4x sizes for the reward.

url_1x.description: URL for the image at 1x size.

url_2x.description: URL for the image at 2x size.

url_4x.description: URL for the image at 4x size.

global_cooldown.description: Whether a cooldown is enabled and what the cooldown is in seconds.

cooldown_expires_at.description: Timestamp of the cooldown expiration.nullif the reward isnt on cooldown.

redemptions_redeemed_current_stream.description: The number of redemptions redeemed during the current live stream. Counts against themax_per_streamlimit.nullif the broadcasters stream isnt live ormax_per_streamisnt enabled.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Add
channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.description: A viewer has redeemed a custom channel points reward on the specified channel.

user_id.description: User ID of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_login.description: Login of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_name.description: Display name of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_input.description: The user input provided. Empty string if not provided.

status.description: Defaults tounfulfilled. Possible values areunknown,unfulfilled,fulfilled, andcanceled.

reward.description: Basic information about the reward that was redeemed, at the time it was redeemed.

redeemed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the reward was redeemed.

channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.title: Channel Points Custom Reward Redemption Update
channel.channel_points_custom_reward_red.description: A redemption of a channel points custom reward has been updated for the specified channel.

user_id.description: User ID of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_login.description: Login of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_name.description: Display name of the user that redeemed the reward.

user_input.description: The user input provided. Empty string if not provided.

status.description: Will befulfilledorcanceled. Possible values areunknown,unfulfilled,fulfilled, andcanceled.

reward.description: Basic information about the reward that was redeemed, at the time it was redeemed.

redeemed_at.description: RFC3339 timestamp of when the reward was redeemed.

channel.poll.begin.title: Channel Poll Begin
channel.poll.begin.description: A poll started on a specified channel.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

ends_at.description: The time the poll will end.

channel.poll.progress.title: Channel Poll Progress
channel.poll.progress.description: Users respond to a poll on a specified channel.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll. Includes vote counts.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

ends_at.description: The time the poll will end.

channel.poll.end.title: Channel Poll End
channel.poll.end.description: A poll ended on a specified channel.

choices.description: An array of choices for the poll. Includes vote counts.

bits_votes.description: Number of votes received via Bits.

channel_points_votes.description: Number of votes received via Channel Points.

votes.description: Total number of votes received for the choice across all methods of voting.

bits_voting.description: The Bits voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Bits can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Bits required to vote once with Bits.

channel_points_voting.description: The Channel Points voting settings for the poll.

is_enabled.description: Indicates if Channel Points can be used for voting.

amount_per_vote.description: Number of Channel Points required to vote once with Channel Points.

status.description: The status of the poll. Valid values are completed, archived, and terminated.

channel.prediction.begin.title: Channel Prediction Begin
channel.prediction.begin.description: A Prediction started on a specified channel.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locks_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction will automatically lock.

channel.prediction.progress.title: Channel Prediction Progress
channel.prediction.progress.description: Users participated in a Prediction on a specified channel.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locks_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction will automatically lock.

channel.prediction.lock.title: Channel Prediction Lock
channel.prediction.lock.description: A Prediction was locked on a specified channel.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

locked_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction was locked.

channel.prediction.end.title: Channel Prediction End
channel.prediction.end.description: A Prediction ended on a specified channel.

title.description: Title for the Channel Points Prediction.

outcomes.description: An array of outcomes for the Channel Points Prediction. Includes top_predictors.

color.description: The color for the outcome. Valid values are pink and blue.

users.description: The number of users who used Channel Points on this outcome.

channel_points.description: The total number of Channel Points used on this outcome.

top_predictors.description: An array of users who used the most Channel Points on this outcome.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

channel_points_won.description: The number of Channel Points won. This value is always null in the event payload for Prediction progress and Prediction lock. This value is 0 if the outcome did not win or if the Prediction was canceled and Channel Points were refunded.

channel_points_used.description: The number of Channel Points used to participate in the Prediction.

status.description: The status of the Channel Points Prediction. Valid values are resolved and canceled.

started_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction started.

ended_at.description: The time the Channel Points Prediction ended.

channel.charity_campaign.donate.title: Charity Donation
channel.charity_campaign.donate.description: A viewer donated to the charity campaign

broadcaster_id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the broadcaster that's running the campaign.

user_id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the user that donated to the campaign.

user_login.description: The user's login name.

user_name.description: The user's display name.

amount.description: An object that contains the amount of the user's donation.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

channel.charity_campaign.start.title: Charity Campaign Start
channel.charity_campaign.start.description: A broadcaster started a charity campaign.

id.description: An ID that identifies the charity campaign.

broadcaster_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that's running the campaign.

charity_logo.description: A URL to an image of the charity's logo. The image's type is PNG and its size is 100px X 100px.

charity_website.description: A URL to the charity's website.

current_amount.description: An object that contains the current amount of donations that the campaign has received.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

target_amount.description: An object that contains the campaign's target fundraising goal.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the broadcaster started the campaign.

channel.charity_campaign.progress.title: Charity Campaign Progress
channel.charity_campaign.progress.description: Progress was made towards a broadcaster's charity campaign.

id.description: An ID that identifies the charity campaign.

broadcaster_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that's running the campaign.

charity_logo.description: A URL to an image of the charity's logo. The image's type is PNG and its size is 100px X 100px.

charity_website.description: A URL to the charity's website.

current_amount.description: An object that contains the current amount of donations that the campaign has received.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

target_amount.description: An object that contains the campaign's target fundraising goal.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

channel.charity_campaign.stop.title: Charity Campaign Progress
channel.charity_campaign.stop.description: Progress was made towards a broadcaster's charity campaign.

id.description: An ID that identifies the charity campaign.

broadcaster_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that's running the campaign.

charity_logo.description: A URL to an image of the charity's logo. The image's type is PNG and its size is 100px X 100px.

charity_website.description: A URL to the charity's website.

current_amount.description: An object that contains the final amount of donations that the campaign received.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

target_amount.description: An object that contains the campaign's target fundraising goal.

value.description: The monetary amount. The amount is specified in the currency's minor unit. For example, the minor units for USD is cents, so if the amount is $5.50 USD, value is set to 550.

decimal_places.description:
The number of decimal places used by the currency. For example, USD uses two decimal places. Use this number to translate value from minor units to major units by using the formula:

value / 10^decimal_places

currency.description: The ISO-4217 three-letter currency code that identifies the type of currency in value.

stopped_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the broadcaster stopped the campaign.

channel.goal.begin.title: Goal Begin
channel.goal.begin.description: Get notified when a broadcaster begins a goal.

id.description: An ID that identifies this event.

broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the broadcaster.

type.description: The type of goal. Can be follow, subscription, subscription_count, new_subscription, or new_subscription_count

description.description: A description of the goal, if specified. The description may contain a maximum of 40 characters.

target_amount.description: The goal's target value. For example, if the broadcaster has 200 followers before creating the goal, and their goal is to double that number, this field is set to 400.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp in RFC 3339 format, which indicates when the broadcaster created the goal.

channel.goal.progress.title: Goal Progress
channel.goal.progress.description: Get notified when progress (either positive or negative) is made towards a broadcasters goal.

id.description: An ID that identifies this event.

broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the broadcaster.

type.description: The type of goal. Can be follow, subscription, subscription_count, new_subscription, or new_subscription_count

description.description: A description of the goal, if specified. The description may contain a maximum of 40 characters.

target_amount.description: The goal's target value. For example, if the broadcaster has 200 followers before creating the goal, and their goal is to double that number, this field is set to 400.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp in RFC 3339 format, which indicates when the broadcaster created the goal.

channel.goal.end.title: Goal End
channel.goal.end.description: Get notified when a broadcaster ends a goal.

id.description: An ID that identifies this event.

broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies the broadcaster.

type.description: The type of goal. Can be follow, subscription, subscription_count, new_subscription, or new_subscription_count

description.description: A description of the goal, if specified. The description may contain a maximum of 40 characters.

is_achieved.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the broadcaster achieved their goal. Is true if the goal was achieved; otherwise, false.

target_amount.description: The goal's target value. For example, if the broadcaster has 200 followers before creating the goal, and their goal is to double that number, this field is set to 400.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp in RFC 3339 format, which indicates when the broadcaster created the goal.

ended_at.description: The UTC timestamp in RFC 3339 format, which indicates when the broadcaster ended the goal.

channel.hype_train.begin.title: Hype Train Begin
channel.hype_train.begin.description: A Hype Train begins on the specified channel.

total.description: Total points contributed to the Hype Train.

progress.description: The number of points contributed to the Hype Train at the current level.

goal.description: The number of points required to reach the next level.

top_contributions.description: The contributors with the most points contributed.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.

started_at.description: The time when the Hype Train started.

expires_at.description: The time when the Hype Train expires. The expiration is extended when the Hype Train reaches a new level.

channel.hype_train.progress.title: Hype Train Progress
channel.hype_train.progress.description: A Hype Train makes progress on the specified channel.

level.description: The current level of the Hype Train.

total.description: Total points contributed to the Hype Train.

progress.description: The number of points contributed to the Hype Train at the current level.

goal.description: The number of points required to reach the next level.

top_contributions.description: The contributors with the most points contributed.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.

started_at.description: The time when the Hype Train started.

expires_at.description: The time when the Hype Train expires. The expiration is extended when the Hype Train reaches a new level.

channel.hype_train.end.title: Hype Train End
channel.hype_train.end.description: A Hype Train ends on the specified channel.

level.description: The current level of the Hype Train.

total.description: Total points contributed to the Hype Train.

top_contributions.description: The contributors with the most points contributed.

user_id.description: The ID of the user.

user_login.description: The login of the user.

user_name.description: The display name of the user.

type.description: Type of contribution. Valid values includebits,subscription.

started_at.description: The time when the Hype Train started.

ended_at.description: The time when the Hype Train ended.

cooldown_ends_at.description: The time when the Hype Train cooldown ends so that the next Hype Train can start.

channel.shield_mode.begin.title: Shield Mode Begin
channel.shield_mode.begin.description: Get notified when the broadcaster activates Shield Mode.

moderator_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the moderator that updated the Shield Mode's status. If the broadcaster updated the status, this ID will be the same as broadcaster_user_id.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the moderator activated Shield Mode

channel.shield_mode.end.title: Shield Mode End
channel.shield_mode.end.description: Get notified when the broadcaster deactivates Shield Mode.

moderator_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the moderator that updated the Shield Mode's status. If the broadcaster updated the status, this ID will be the same as broadcaster_user_id.

ended_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the moderator deactivated Shield Mode

channel.shoutout.create.title: Shoutout Created
channel.shoutout.create.description: Get notified when the specified broadcaster sends a Shoutout.

broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that sent the Shoutout.

to_broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that received the Shoutout.

moderator_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the moderator that sent the Shoutout. If the broadcaster sent the Shoutout, this ID is the same as the ID in broadcaster_user_id.

viewer_count.description: The number of users that were watching the broadcaster's stream at the time of the Shoutout.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the moderator sent the Shoutout.

cooldown_ends_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the broadcaster may send a Shoutout to a different broadcaster.

target_cooldown_ends_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the broadcaster may send another Shoutout to the broadcaster in to_broadcaster_user_id.

channel.shoutout.receive.title: Shoutout Received
channel.shoutout.receive.description: Get notified when the specified broadcaster receives a Shoutout.

broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that received the Shoutout.

from_broadcaster_user_id.description: An ID that identifies the broadcaster that sent the Shoutout.

viewer_count.description: The number of users that were watching the broadcaster's stream at the time of the Shoutout.

started_at.description: The UTC timestamp (in RFC3339 format) of when the moderator sent the Shoutout.
